info.name: Server Errors
info.description: This collection helps you learn how to configure different scenarios/examples for any endpoint/request.

query.description: Can take one of the following values - cats, dogs, rabbits

request.description:
Fetches you the list of animals in the pet store.

The endpoint supports filtering the list of animals by `type`. The set of allowed values for `type` are `cats, dogs and rabbits`.

Multiple examples have been added to this request to help you understand how this API would work in the real world.

response.name: Get all animals
Get all dogs

query.description: Can take one of the following values - cats, dogs, rabbits, birds

response.name: No matching animals found in the store

query.description: Can take one of the following values - cats, dogs, rabbits

response.name: Get all cats

query.description: Can take one of the following values - cats, dogs, rabbits, birds

response.name: Get all rabbits

query.description: Can take one of the following values - cats, dogs, rabbits, birds

request.description:
Add animals to the petstore.

This API expects `type, breed, description and life span` parameters to be passed in reequest body for adding new animlas to the store.

response.name: Add new breed to the store

request.description:
Delete animals from the store.

This API expects `type and breed` parameters to be passed in reequest body for deleting animlas from the store.

response.name: Remove breed from the store
